etymology.description: 大同 (Datong; great harmony) + 区/區 (district) = Datong District (Taipei).
etymology.interpretation: Names an administrative district of Taipei; “Datong” evokes the classical ideal of great harmony and serves here as a proper name.
etymology.simplification: 區 was simplified to 区 in mainland reforms to reduce strokes and complexity; Taiwan retains 區, and 大同 is unchanged.

parts.english: great unity; grand harmony; Datong (name); ideal society

examples.chinese: 大同区在台北市的西北部(大同區在臺北市的西北部)。
examples.pinyin: Dàtóng Qū zài Táiběi Shì de xīběi bù.
examples.english: Datong District is in the northwest part of Taipei City.

examples.chinese: 我们去大同区逛迪化街和宁夏夜市(我們去大同區逛迪化街和寧夏夜市)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen qù Dàtóng Qū guàng Díhuà Jiē hé Níngxià Yèshì.
examples.english: We’re going to Datong District to stroll along Dihua Street and Ningxia Night Market.

examples.chinese: 他住在大同区，通勤到中山区上班(他住在大同區，通勤到中山區上班)。
examples.pinyin: Tā zhù zài Dàtóng Qū, tōngqín dào Zhōngshān Qū shàngbān.
examples.english: He lives in Datong District and commutes to Zhongshan District for work.
